Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add complete To-Do feature with task management and activity tracking

- Add To-Do tab to dashboard with table view
- Implement todo types with inline creation and case-insensitive uniqueness
- Add New Task button to header navigation with modal
- Create task detail modal with view/edit functionality and activity history
- Implement comprehensive API endpoints:
  - GET/POST /api/todos with query parameters \(search, filters, pagination\)
  - GET/PATCH /api/todos/[id] for individual todo operations
  - GET /api/todos/[id]/activity for activity history
  - GET/POST /api/todo-types for type management
- Add activity logging for all todo mutations
- Include filtering by type, status, and completion state
- Support for priorities \(low/medium/high\) and custom notes
- Track created_by, updated_by, completed_by with timestamps
